title: AS Monaco FC - Wikipedia
snippet: On 4 July 2023, Monaco appointed Adi Hütter who signed a two-year deal with the club. In his first season at the helm, he guided the club to a runner-up finish in the 2023–24 season, and qualification to the Champions League group stage for the first time since 2018–19.

title: Sébastien Pocognoli is the new AS Monaco coach
snippet: AS Monaco are delighted to announce the appointment of Sébastien Pocognoli, the 38-year-old Belgian manager, as the new coach.

title: Adi Hütter - Wikipedia
snippet: As a coach, he won the Austrian double, for the renamed Red Bull Salzburg, as well as the Swiss Super League with Young Boys. He then managed Eintracht Frankfurt from 2018 to 2021, Borussia Mönchengladbach for the 2021–22 season, and Monaco from 2023 to 2025.
